.. only:: html

    .. note::
        :class: sphx-glr-download-link-note

        Click :ref:`here <sphx_glr_download_gallery_plot_geom_path.py>`     to download the full example code
    .. rst-class:: sphx-glr-example-title

    .. _sphx_glr_gallery_plot_geom_path.py:


Geometry geom_path()
====================

An example with the geom_path() geometry.


.. code-block:: default



    import numpy as np

    from lets_plot import *
    LetsPlot.setup_html()









.. code-block:: default


    phi = np.linspace(0, 2 * np.pi, 100)
    rho = 1 - .9 * np.sin(phi)
    data = {'x': rho * np.cos(phi), \
            'y': rho * np.sin(phi)}









.. code-block:: default


    ggplot(data, aes(x='x', y='y')) + \
        geom_path(size=1, color='red') + \
        coord_fixed()
